Welcome to Learning Simulator’s documentation!¶

Learning Simulator is a Python program used for simulating associative learning mechanisms. It uses a simple and well-documented scripting language to specify the properties of the mechanism and the description of the experiment setup being simulated.

The documentation for Learning Simulator is hosted on Read the Docs.
